p: Blood, urine and saliva samples (n = 69) from 27 patients presenting symptoms consistent with CHIKV infection from Serraria Brasil neighborhood were collected by active surveillance of Municipal Health Surveillance Division of Feira de Santana (SMS-SVS). Molecular diagnostics (RT-qPCR) were performed by Virology and Experimental Therapy Laboratory (LaVite) at Aggeu Magalh√£es Institute (IAM) FIOCRUZ-PE and specific CHIKV-IgG and CHIKV-IgM serology (ELISA- Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay) by Bahia state central public laboratory (LACEN-BA).
